title: Creating ranked team
body: hi im plat 5 ranked my ign is kaiyunman i live in australia and i main top. i need 1adc prefer{{champion:119}}  or{{champion:67}}  1 sup prefer{{champion:412}}  or{{champion:25}} we also need 1 jg prefer{{champion:11}}  or {{champion:59}} if you are interested pls add me on league and tell me your interested. this is just a have fun ranked team. ps must have skype

replies.body: I'd gladly help you in any way. I can adc as {{champion:15}} and supp as {{champion:1}} or {{champion:201}}. I can jg as {{champion:80}} and i can top as {{champion:75}} If you want to recruit me then just reply to this comment ;)
if your still looking for people ill happily join it i can play anywhere add me master frog

Hey, jw if your still looking for people to join your ranked team.
I'm looking for a team I'm online most days and I main adc and support but can play any role

Hello :) I am currently silver 3. I main adc. I was gold 2 last season but i've moved from mid to adc to learn the role. Since about 3 days ago i've started actually winning again! I'm already in a ranked team that I play on tuesdays (plat/gold mostly)- but i would like very much to play adc (or mid if i must) in another ranked team to just get more experience. Last season i went from B5 to G2 in 3000 ranked games and this season S5 to S3 in about 200. PLayed about 60-70 ranked 5's games since last season. Please add me in game :) IGN: BurstFire301

im down for all those roles. im better at other ADCs tho...and i pref vi over J4, but can still do those 2. the other 2 are perfectly fine, but would like to add leona and braum into the mix, and taric any time the enemy picks kalista.
